title: William Barr's No-Show, Russia's Spy Whale & Jordan Klepper's Look at U.S. Activism | Charlize Theron
itunes:title: William Barr's No-Show, Russia's Spy Whale & Jordan Klepper's Look at U.S. Activism | Charlize Theron
description:
A whale is suspected of being a Russian spy, Jordan Klepper shares clips from his activism-oriented show Klepper, and Charlize Theron talks about her role in "Long Shot."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
